title: Projects
text:
Phone: (208) 371‑5641

Email: HowaJosh2000@gmail.com

Location: 397 Thomson Farms Rd Apt 3306







Maintain accurate financial records for member accounts, including new account setup, data updates and status changes.
Ensure strict confidentiality when handling member information in accordance with BSA regulations.
Support internal audits by compiling and organising account documentation for management and compliance teams.
Demonstrate strong organisational and analytical skills in balancing member account data and resolving inconsistencies.





Interpret blueprints and project specifications to ensure materials and measurements align precisely with design constraints.
Prioritise safety and compliance with building codes and workplace regulations, aligning with accounting’s emphasis on controls and regulatory adherence.





Completed full–time missionary service in El Salvador and Minneapolis, Minnesota, developing strong interpersonal, organisational and leadership skills across culturally diverse regions.
Managed schedules, tracked personal and team goals and maintained daily records with consistency and accuracy.








Bachelor of Science in Accounting

Minor: Engineering

Tools: Excel, Outlook and AutoCAD

Courses: Pivot tables and basic accounting courses






CSWP — Professional certification in SolidWorks





Spanish — Proficient in speaking, reading and writing





General ledger knowledge
Basic SQL
Transaction processing
Critical thinking
Conflict resolution
Microsoft Excel
Microsoft Power BI

title: Blog
text:
Highlights

Member Service Representative, Beehive Federal Credit Union — Maintained accurate financial records for member accounts, ensured confidentiality and supported internal audits (June 2023 – present).
Framer / General Builder, Black Creek Builders — Interpreted blueprints, aligned materials to specifications and prioritised safety and compliance (June 2016 – Dec 2022).
Missionary Service — Served in El Salvador & Minneapolis, developing cross–cultural communication and leadership skills (June 2019 – June 2021).

title: Blog
text:
What I’m working on
I’m currently expanding my skillset by applying statistical analysis and machine learning to financial datasets. Future posts on this blog will showcase data visualisations, predictive models and the occasional deep dive into accounting topics viewed through a data–science lens.
{{fig-align=“center” width=“100%”}} “““.format(name=cfg[‘name’], tagline=cfg[‘tagline’]) with open(root /”index.qmd”, “w”, encoding=“utf-8”) as f: f.write(content.strip() + “”)
